data.text: @CoCoHealth You better stop talking about COVID-19 as it is a sensitive subject to some people who you shut down their hair salon, restaurants, gyms, mask for kids... mandates after mandate. No credibility at all you are all power hungry fascists. Move to something else we know you
@CoCoHealth Or, rest up and get better.

@CoCoHealth Biologically illiterate CCHS. What is testing going to do for anyone with symptoms? We treat the symptoms not the disease. I don’t know where you imbeciles got your medical degrees but it wasn’t in the same world I got mine.
@CoCoHealth Would have been nice a month ago - I had to wait a week to test and my girls lost two weeks of work - still unpaid sick leave
